thread.title: COC head Marcel Aubut faces new sexual harassment allegations
thread.title_full: COC head Marcel Aubut faces new sexual harassment allegations

author: SEAN GORDON And DANIEL LEBLANC
title: COC head Marcel Aubut faces new sexual harassment allegations
text:
Canadian Olympic Committee President Marcel Aubut listens during an announcement in support of the Canadian Center for Ethics in Sport's work in anti-doping November 5, 2013 in Ottawa. (Dave Chan For The Globe and Mail) investigation COC head Marcel Aubut faces new sexual harassment allegations SEAN GORDON And DANIEL LEBLANC MONTREAL and OTTAWA — The Globe and Mail 
Published Thursday, Oct. 01, 2015 10:35PM EDT 
Last updated Thursday, Oct. 01, 2015 10:36PM EDT 
More women are coming forward with allegations concerning Canadian Olympic Committee head Marcel Aubut, who has stepped aside pending the investigation of a sexual harassment complaint from a staffer. 
They accuse Mr. Aubut of making unwanted advances that include fondling, touching and forcibly kissing them. connect with us The Globe and Mail Newspaper
